level.text: The lead agency shall charge the applicant a fee for the review of the EISF and the EIS.
The EISF and EIS review fee is fifty-five dollars ($55) per hour.
For any EISF or EIS, the total review fee shall not exceed one percent (1.0%) of the total project cost of the proposed major action.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 44 DCR 2799 (May 9, 1997); as amended by Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Act of 2010, effective September 24, 2010 (D.C. Law 18-223), published at 57 DCR 6242, 6368 (July 23, 2010).
